data.name: Witch 2 Hell Adventure Lost in paintings
data.detailed_description:
This DLC pack adds the Antiquist to the game. You can see meet in the first location, in the tent ring. Agree to follow him to start the adventure
You will face four new locations and the fortress prison. Solve the puzzles to get out of the fortress. Three main endings plus one.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 5 1024Vram
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: WIN10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 10
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
